jumboData.title: Hello!
jumboData.firstParagraph: After working in the printing pre-press for over 15 years, i wanted to move and learn in software development. So in December 2020 i started a six-month training at the Diginamic center in Montpellier City. Later, i continued an internship in a start'up specializing in e-commerce and the e-sport ecosystem.
jumboData.secondParagraph: Today, i continue my apprenticeship in the web domain, here are below my current skills.

cardData.title: PoC Music-Video-Center
cardData.paragraph: development web app about music with angular v12, material components, Back-End Nodejs, Database and hosting with Google Firebase. Call API Wikipedia, Youtube, Discogs.
